diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AC$ is $x$ units.
The length of the line $BC$ is $z$ units.
The length of the line $AB$ is $20$ units.
The length of the line $AD$ is $10$ units.
The length of the line $BD$ is $y$ units.
Point $A$ lies on the line connecting $C$ and $D$.
The line $AC$ is perpendicular to the line $AB$.
The line $BC$ is perpendicular to the line $BD$.
